# Tortoise: AI-readable product context

last_updated: 2026-02-23
source: https://tortoise.run

## What Tortoise is
Tortoise is an AI-native running app for race preparation.
Its core differentiator is race-day-first planning: users set a race date and Tortoise builds a personalized plan backward from that target.

## Core value proposition
- Set race day and work backwards
- Adaptive AI training plan based on consistency and progress
- Gamified motivation loops to improve adherence
